package.json.content:
{
  "name": "chantierpro",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "next dev",
    "build": "next build",
    "start": "next start",
    "lint": "next lint",
    "db:push": "prisma db push",
    "db:generate": "prisma generate",
    "db:seed": "tsx prisma/seed.ts"
  },
  "prisma": {
    "seed": "tsx prisma/seed.ts"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@auth/prisma-adapter": "^2.10.0",
    "@prisma/client": "^6.13.0",
    "@radix-ui/react-accordion": "^1.2.11",
    "@radix-ui/react-checkbox": "^1.3.2",
    "@radix-ui/react-label": "^2.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-progress": "^1.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-separator": "^1.1.7",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.2.3",
    "@radix-ui/react-switch": "^1.2.5",
    "@types/bcrypt": "^6.0.0",
    "bcrypt": "^6.0.0",
    "lucide-react": "^0.536.0",
    "next": "^15.4.6",
    "next-auth": "^4.24.11",
    "prisma": "^6.13.0",
    "react": "^19.1.1",
    "react-dom": "^19.1.1",
    "zod": "^4.0.15"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@tailwindcss/typography": "^0.5.16",
    "@types/node": "24.2.0",
    "@types/react": "19.1.9",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.21",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "eslint": "^9.33.0",
    "eslint-config-next": "^15.4.6",
    "postcss": "^8.5.6",
    "tailwind-merge": "^3.3.1",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.0",
    "tsx": "^4.20.4",
    "typescript": "5.9.2"
  }
}

"use client"; import { useAuth } from "@/hooks/useAuth"; import { Calendar, TrendingUp, Users, AlertTriangle, Clock, Settings, Plus, ArrowRight, BarChart3, DollarSign, Building2, CheckCircle2 } from "lucide-react"; import { useRouter } from "next/navigation"; import Link from "next/link"; export default function DashboardPage() { const { user, isLoading } = useAuth(); const router = useRouter(); if (isLoading) { return (
Chargement du dashboard...
); } if (!user) return null; return (
{/* Header avec salutation personnalise */}

Bonjour {user.name} !

{user.role === 'ADMIN' ? 'Vue d\'ensemble de votre plateforme' : user.role === 'COMMERCIAL' ? 'Grez vos projets et clients' : 'Suivez l\'avancement de vos projets'}

Systme oprationnel
{/* Statistiques principales */}
{[ { title: "Chantiers Actifs", value: "15", change: "+3 ce mois", icon: Building2, color: "from-blue-500 to-blue-600", bgColor: "bg-blue-50", href: "/dashboard/chantiers" }, { title: "quipes Mobilises", value: "8", change: "+2 cette semaine", icon: Users, color: "from-green-500 to-green-600", bgColor: "bg-green-50", href: "/dashboard/users" }, { title: "CA Mensuel", value: "450K", change: "+12% vs mois dernier", icon: DollarSign, color: "from-purple-500 to-purple-600", bgColor: "bg-purple-50", href: "/dashboard/devis" }, { title: "Taux de Russite", value: "94%", change: "+5% d'amlioration", icon: CheckCircle2, color: "from-orange-500 to-orange-600", bgColor: "bg-orange-50", href: "/dashboard" } ].map((stat, index) => (
{stat.value}

{stat.title}

{stat.change}

))}
{/* Contenu principal en grille */}
{/* Activit rcente - 2 colonnes */}

Activit Rcente

Voir tout
{[ { action: "Nouveau chantier cr", details: "Villa Moderne - Sophie Durand", time: "Il y a 15 min", type: "success", icon: "" }, { action: "Devis valid", details: "450K - Rnovation Complte", time: "Il y a 32 min", type: "success", icon: "" }, { action: "quipe assigne", details: "quipe Alpha Projet Extension", time: "Il y a 1h", type: "info", icon: "" }, { action: "Message reu", details: "Client: Question sur planning", time: "Il y a 1h30", type: "message", icon: "" }, { action: "Facture paye", details: "180K - Amnagement Bureau", time: "Il y a 2h", type: "success", icon: "" } ].map((activity, index) => (
{activity.icon}

{activity.action}

{activity.details}

{activity.time}

))}
{/* Colonne droite */}
{/* Alertes importantes */}

Alertes Importantes

{[ { type: "warning", message: "3 chantiers accusent du retard", priority: "Urgent" }, { type: "info", message: "Sauvegarde automatique effectue", priority: "Info" }, { type: "error", message: "Problme connexion API mto", priority: "Moyen" } ].map((alert, index) => (
{alert.message} {alert.priority}
))}
{/* Mto du jour */}

Mto Chantiers

22C

Parfait pour les travaux extrieurs

Vent: 12 km/h Humidit: 45%
{/* Actions rapides */}

Actions Rapides

{[ { title: "Nouveau Chantier", icon: "", href: "/dashboard/chantiers/nouveau", color: "from-blue-500 to-blue-600" }, { title: "Crer Devis", icon: "", href: "/dashboard/devis/nouveau", color: "from-green-500 to-green-600" }, { title: "Messages", icon: "", href: "/dashboard/messages", color: "from-purple-500 to-purple-600" }, { title: "Planning", icon: "", href: "/dashboard/planning", color: "from-orange-500 to-orange-600" }, { title: "Documents", icon: "", href: "/dashboard/documents", color: "from-pink-500 to-pink-600" }, { title: "quipes", icon: "", href: "/dashboard/users", color: "from-indigo-500 to-indigo-600" } ].map((action, index) => (
{action.icon}
{action.title} ))}
); }
